pricing.headerTitle: Flexible Pricing Plans to Meet Your Needs
pricing.headerSubtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your journey into the world of dream interpretation.
pricing.satisfactionGuaranteeText: We are confident in the quality of our services. If you are not completely satisfied with your interpretation, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for paid plans.
pricing.stripeConfigError: Stripe is not configured correctly. Please contact support.
pricing.paymentProcessError: An error occurred during the payment process.
pricing.noPlansAvailable: No pricing plans available at the moment.
pricing.noPlansAvailableError: No pricing plans available currently. The free plan may be displayed.
pricing.loginToChoosePlan: Please log in to choose a plan.
pricing.freePlanSelectedInfo: You are using the available free features. You can submit a dream now.
pricing.planComingSoon: The "{planName}" plan will be available for payment soon.
pricing.dbConfigError: There seems to be a database configuration issue (missing column). Please contact support.
pricing.fetchError: We couldn't load the pricing plans. Please try again later.
pricing.teaserSubtitle: We offer a variety of plans to suit everyone, whether you're a new user or an in-depth dream researcher.
